EASTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
SAO TOME AND PRINCIPE.
DNC 01.
1. M/V APPROACHED BY PIRATES IN 01-07S 007-02E
   AT 140825Z JUL. VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP
   CLEAR OF THIS POSITION AND TO EXERCISE
   EXTREME CAUTION.
   REPORTS TO IMB PIRACY REPORTING CENTER,
   PHONE: 603 2031 0014, 603 2078 5763,
   FAX: 603 2078 5769,
   E-MAIL: IMBKL@ICC-CCS.ORG, PIRACY@ICC-CCS.ORG.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 220729Z JUL 21.
